content: You were alive when you were born and you are alive at this moment, so you must have been alive at every point in between. That implies that everyone's life is convex.
translations: ita:Eri vivo quando sei nato e sei vivo ora, quindi devi essere stato vivo in ogni punto intermedio. Questo implica che la v
